sentence.Network_en: Many of the metals and most of the nonmetals are diamagnetic.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多金属和大部分非金属都是逆磁性的.

sentence.Network_en: The complex is diamagnetic, it is only slightly soluble in water.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个综合物是反磁性的, 它仅微溶于水.

sentence.Network_en: Ergodicity of the Diamagnetic Kepler Problem ( DKP ) is discussed.
sentence.Network_cn: 本章还讨论了反磁 Kepler 问题的遍历性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1846: coined by Faraday, from Greek dia 'through, across' + magnetic

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or exhibiting diamagnetism; slightly repelled by a magnet
